title: Did millions of cancelled cell phones detect the deaths of the Corona virus in China?
subtitle: The United States intelligence agencies have concluded that the Chinese government itself does not know the true number of deaths from the Corona virus.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: There was a decrease of 21 million mobile phone subscribers in China in early 2020 in documents indicating that the number of deaths from COVID-19 had been significantly lower than the number reported in that country.
